ing.item: Beef sirloin; cut into thin strips
Fresh broccoli; cut in 2 inch lengths

directions.step:
Combine beef, soy sauce, wine, cornstarch, sugar, garlic powder and ginger. Marinate for 1/2 hour. Split each length of broccoli into 4 pieces. Drop into boiling water and boil for 2 minutes. Drain. Heat 2 Tablespoons of oil in wok or skillet, add broccoli and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Arrange broccoli in ring at edge of a serving plate. Add remaining 2 Tablespoons of oil to wok. Lift beef from marinade and stir-fry for 1 minute. Add marinade and cook, stirring until glazed. Pour into center of broccoli. Sprinkle almonds over all. Yield: 2 servings.
GAYE WHITE (MRS. FRANK)
From <Traditions: A Taste of the Good Life>, by the Little Rock (AR) Junior League. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
